Class WarGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • WarGame

  • public class WarGame
extends Object
    WarGame class is the guts of the game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Deck deck 
      (package private) boolean gameOver 
      (package private) Hand p1 
      (package private) Hand p2 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WarGame()
      WarGame constructor creates two Hands and one Deck, sets gameOver to false and distributes cards in the Deck into the Hands

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dealCards(Deck fullDeck, Hand p1, Hand p2)
      dealCards distributes all cards in fullDeck to p1 and p2 by calling the dealCard method in CardPile
      boolean gameOver()
      gameOver method returns the result of gameOver variable
      Hand getHand1()
      getHand1 passes reference to p1's Hand
      Hand getHand2()
      getHand2 passes reference to p2's Hand
      void turn()
      turn method makes a move in the game by drawing the top cards from each Hand and comparing the values to see which is higher; whichever hand has the higher card takes both cards and returns them to the bottom of the deck; if both cards have the same value, a war occurs
      void war(Hand p1, Hand p2, Hand extras)
      war method takes the two hands and the "extra" cards and draws two facedown cards then draws two face-up cards and compares values
      void warWithTwoCardsLeft(Hand p1, Hand p2, Hand extras)
      warWithTwoCardsLeft method is used in the situation that one of the hands has only two cards left

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • WarGame

        public WarGame()
        WarGame constructor creates two Hands and one Deck, sets gameOver to false and distributes cards in the Deck into the Hands

    • Method Detail

      • dealCards

        public void dealCards(Deck fullDeck,
             Hand p1,
             Hand p2)
        dealCards distributes all cards in fullDeck to p1 and p2 by calling the dealCard method in CardPile
        Parameters:
        fullDeck - A Deck full of all 52 cards
        p1 - A Hand to hold 26 cards
        p2 - A Hand to hold 26 cards

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        gameOver method returns the result of gameOver variable
        Returns:
        True if gameOver is true, false otherwise

      • getHand1

        public Hand getHand1()
        getHand1 passes reference to p1's Hand
        Returns:
        p1's Hand

      • getHand2

        public Hand getHand2()
        getHand2 passes reference to p2's Hand
        Returns:
        p2's Hand

      • turn

        public void turn()
        turn method makes a move in the game by drawing the top cards from each Hand and comparing the values to see which is higher; whichever hand has the higher card takes both cards and returns them to the bottom of the deck; if both cards have the same value, a war occurs

      • war

        public void war(Hand p1,
       Hand p2,
       Hand extras)
        war method takes the two hands and the "extra" cards and draws two facedown cards then draws two face-up cards and compares values
        Parameters:
        p1 - First Hand
        p2 - Second Hand
        extras - The face-up cards carried over

      • warWithTwoCardsLeft

        public void warWithTwoCardsLeft(Hand p1,
                       Hand p2,
                       Hand extras)
        warWithTwoCardsLeft method is used in the situation that one of the hands has only two cards left
        Parameters:
        p1 - First Hand
        p2 - Second Hand
        extras - The face-up cards carried over
